reviewText:
This and all other Auf Wiedersen Pet productions are most watchable, great characters and actors.
Love the accents.

I loved this series when I watched it years ago and loved it just as much second time around. Quality of DVD is terrific and speed of delivery was great. Jimmy Nail, Bill Nighy, Kevin Whateley and all the lads were a great combination in this show and most have gone onto great acting careers. Love the humour and accents.
